tool_description: Processes taxpayer profile updates including personal information changes, business modifications, and address updates with proper audit trails.

field_updates.description: Array of field names and new values to update

effective_date.description: Date when changes should take effect

notification_preferences.description: How to notify taxpayer of changes

error_messages: Taxpayer not found: No taxpayer found with the specified ID
Invalid field update: One or more fields cannot be updated or contain invalid values
Missing supporting documents: Updates require supporting documentation
Invalid update source: Use one of [taxpayer_request, audit_correction, system_update]
Update authorization failed: User does not have permission to make requested changes
Concurrent update conflict: Another update is in progress for this taxpayer
usage: Specify taxpayer ID, field updates, and reason. Include supporting documents if required. Tool validates changes, updates profile, and maintains audit trail.

update_status.description: Result of update operation (completed, pending_verification, failed)

updated_fields.description: List of fields that were successfully updated

audit_reference.description: Reference ID for audit trail entry
